SENT.plain: Antithrombin III concentration was studied in 86 patients with recurrent or extensive venous thrombosis
Two of them were found to have an hereditary antithrombin III deficiency
25 patients receiving heparin therapy had low antithrombin III concentration
After stopping heparin treatment antithrombin rose to a normal level
Pathological antithrombin III modifications are recalled (synthesis decrease in liver diseases, intra vascular consumption during active venous thrombosis)
Antithrombin III decreased activity induced by heparin treatment is pointed out
